claim_card.claim: Reproducibility measures are specified: SHA-256 hashes of responses/source texts are archived, and materials are stored in plain text/Markdown for long-term verification.
claim_card.test_hook: Recompute SHA-256 hashes on archived artifacts and confirm exact match; verify materials are retrievable and unmodified.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: SHA-256 hashes of all model responses and source texts archived
